title: Royalford Mesh Waste Bin, RF9796
raw_desc: PERFECT FOR ANY ROOM - Ideal for use in the office, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom/dorm room, etc., Furnish every room of your home with a wastebasket, Outfit a new office with a waste bin at every desk; Separate recyclables from trash with multiple baskets. Use them your way. CONVENIENCE - Large, round opening and tapered shape make sure trash goes into the can, not around it; wire mesh keeps the wastebasket well-ventilated, preventing the build-up of moisture and smells. ATTRACTIVE FINISH - Constructed from a steel mesh casing in a black epoxy finish with a reinforced top rim and solid steel base. Epoxy finish is attractive but tough. The steel mesh construction provides for a breathable wastebasket that helps prevent the build-up of moisture. The breathable design prevents odor from building up.
